titleStmt.title: Valentine and Orson the two sonnes of the Emperour of Greece : newly corrected and amended, with new pictures lively expressing the history.
Valentin et Orson (French romance). English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Purslow for T. Passinger ...,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
A translation of the French prose romance, Valentin et Orson, the original of which was written between 1475 and 1489.
Imperfect: cropped and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
